Item(by='catwind7', descendants=169, kids=[24700016, 24698374, 24698327, 24698301, 24700090, 24698706, 24698517, 24698279, 24700563, 24698549, 24698316, 24699028, 24698363, 24698414, 24700448, 24699880, 24699954, 24698129, 24699917, 24698261, 24699771, 24700088, 24700644, 24713863, 24699013, 24698580, 24700053, 24699927, 24700593, 24699666, 24699649, 24699900, 24702246, 24700265, 24699999, 24698744, 24700538, 24711340, 24700144, 24699100, 24698639, 24698589, 24699317, 24700156, 24698491, 24700662, 24700885, 24700475, 24700402, 24713038, 24700173, 24698194, 24698366, 24700431, 24698311, 24699248, 24698465, 24698441, 24698420, 24698713, 24711120, 24698516, 24706028, 24699814, 24700535, 24700849, 24698895, 24698302, 24698189, 24699397, 24698421, 24699307, 24700350, 24698503, 24698649, 24700202, 24699963, 24698249, 24698471, 24698277, 24699276, 24698760, 24698331, 24698038, 24699881, 24700274, 24699435, 24698283, 24698509, 24698950, 24700472, 24699145, 24698647, 24698786, 24700751, 24699539, 24706676, 24698187, 24700962, 24704503, 24702700, 24698255, 24700444, 24700182, 24700051, 24700506, 24704961, 24705545], score=131, time=1601994418, title='Ask HN: Essential skill needed to be a programmer?', item_type='story', url=None, parent=None, text='In the book Coders at Work by Peter Siebel, he asks peter norvig this question:<p>&quot;So is there any essential skill needed to be a programmer? Different domains obviously have different requirements but ultimately is there some commonality to writing code regardless of domain?&quot;<p>Peters answer to this _really_ resonated with me - his first two sentences were &quot;You&#x27;ve got to be able to make progress and then improve on it. That&#x27;s all you need to be able to do in life.&quot;<p>How would you answer this question?')
